column3: Legend Of The Northern Blade (북검전기) is a Korean novel series created by Woo-Gak.
Ronan lived a wasteful life filled with regrets. A second chance befalls him at the end of his futile life.
The Mad Demon, Jaha Lee, dreams of becoming the God of Martial Arts
Chung Myung, The 13th Disciple of the Great Flowery Mountain Sect, One of the 3 Great Swordsmen,
